text: The Wonderful Wizard of Oz is a fantasy novel written by L. Frank Baum. The Wonderful Wizard of Oz may also refer to: *The Wonderful Wizard of Oz (1910 film), the earliest surviving film adaptation of Baum's book *The Wonderful Wizard of Oz (1975 film) *The Wonderful Wizard of Oz (1986 TV series), a Japanese anime adaptation of four of Baum's books *The Wonderful Wizard of Oz (comics), the first of a series of comic book adaptations published by Marvel Comics *The Wonderful Wizard of Oz (musical), a musical play based on the novel ==See also== *Oz the Great and Powerful, 2013 film *The Wonderful Wizard of Ha's, a VeggieTales film *The Wizard of Oz (disambiguation) *Oz (disambiguation)
title: The Wonderful Wizard of Oz (disambiguation)
